snippet: Ms. Sullivan’s performance was inspired by one family’s journey from Oklahoma to California and back.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews cabaret performance by singer Stacy Sullivan at Metropolitan Room.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Sullivan’s performance was inspired by one family’s journey from Oklahoma to California and back.

headline.main: Review: Stacy Sullivan, Guided by History and Weather, at the Metropolitan Room
headline.print_headline: Guided by Climate, Retold Through Cabaret
